alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 15 at 6:39AM MST until February 15 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Bryce Canyon Country. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Warning, until 10 AM MST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
